title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 9
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Fairy dresses, Bernadette and Lucinda, football, winter woollies and meditation
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Maya and her fairy costume; Jennifer from Regent talks about Bernadette and Lucinda; Kieran from St Kilda loves football; Kay has a favourite hat and scarf; and Monica from Avondale Heights talks about Meditation.
